artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Designer: Laura Foster Nicholson; Mill: Gessner A G; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: This project follows a design from onset to end & shows textiles in various stages of design and correction…to the finished product. Vertical branches with apples & leaves. Design formed by using full warp & weft; background is decreased. Clipped twice Tree trunks in two shades of brown. Green, lime green and yellow on leaves with red and orange apples on cream background (red/orange)
dimension: overall (Not trimmed): 16 3/4 x 19 3/4 in. (42.55 x 50.17 cm)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Laura Foster Nicholson%2C Larsen Design Studio
medium: Linen weft/cotton warp. Metallic in some pieces.
title: Apple Tree Project
